thread.section_title: POP Yachts Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of POP Yachts | popyachts.com
thread.title: David B. Bird
thread.title_full: POP Yachts reviewed by David B. Bird

author: David B. Bird
title: David B. Bird
text:
When I finally had all of the questions and pictures ready the listing and sale was completed in less than a week. Guess there was a buyer out there that my boat fit his needs. Deposit and payment move along better than most deals i have been involved in. Great service and the Reps kept me updated as the sale progressed.
Could not be happier.
